attributes.action: Stop turning Britain into a Police State by introducing biometric ID cards/Passports and generally eroding our rights in the name of terrorism!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain is being turned into a police state and we would very much like you to stop now. 28,000 of us signed the petition against ID cards and the National ID Database and yet you send us out a patronising e-mail suggesting that we are somehow to thick to understand the implications of the scheme and give us a Mother knows best reaction. We believe we need this as much as we believed there were WMD in Iraq. Keep Britain a free country and DESIST IN TURNING US INTO A POLICE STATE!!!

rejection.details:
There are already lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=id+cards
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
